burn marks.clueDescription: Burn marks on the floor, walls, and ceiling.

blood stains.clueDescription: Tiny blood stains on the floor by the door.

scuff marks.clueDescription: Scuff marks on the top right corner of the vent.

desk.clueDescription: A desk with several items on it.

chair.clueDescription: A very basic wooden chair, nothing special, however, there is a small hole in the back of the chair.

bed.clueDescription: A very basic iron bed, you notice holdings for what may appear to be for restraints...

wall.clueDescription: You notice a wall riddled with hand-written letters

floor.clueDescription: Upon closer inspection, you can see various clues on the floor...
